title: Was Trump at the Cheyenne Mountain military base looking at the "evidence " from the stolen Pelosi laptop?
subtitle: He claims Trump saw the "evidence" on the laptop soon became viral.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Pelosi was heading to the border, but he was held in an unknown location because of evidence witnessed by President Donald Trump at the Cheyenne Mountain military base. The evidence was found on a laptop stolen from her office during the Capitol riot.
